Package org.gradle.play.platform

Interface PlayPlatform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named, Platform
    @Incubating
@Deprecated
public interface PlayPlatform
extends Platform
    Deprecated.
    Defines and configures a Play Framework environment including versions of Play, Scala and Java.
